product_overview: The Audio Transcription Assistant is a web app that helps users transcribe and summarize audio content from YouTube videos or uploaded files using AI. It offers a user-friendly dashboard, supports multiple AI providers, and maintains an archive of past transcriptions for easy access.
core_goals: Enable secure user authentication and protected access.
Support extracting and transcribing audio from YouTube URLs and uploaded files.
Allow users to select AI provider for transcription and summarization (Google Gemini or OpenAI).
Provide real-time progress feedback during audio processing via server-sent events.
Save and display full transcriptions, summaries, and key topics for user reference.
Allow users to configure and securely save their API keys for AI services.
Maintain a straightforward and responsive user interface built with React and TailwindCSS.
key_features: User Authentication with registration and login via Supabase Auth.
Media Input support for YouTube URLs and direct audio file uploads.
Dual AI Integration offering Google Gemini for fast, cost-effective processing and OpenAI Whisper+GPT for high accuracy.
Real-time progress updates streamed to the frontend during extraction, transcription, and summarization stages.
Dashboard showing current and past transcription jobs with summaries and key topics.
Settings page for users to manage their AI provider API keys and preferences securely.
Saved Summaries archive enabling browsing and reviewing of historical transcriptions and summaries.
Protected routes ensuring that only authenticated users can access sensitive pages.
Clear user flows from landing page authentication, media input, processing, to results display.
user_flow_summary: Users start at the landing/login page to authenticate.
After login, users arrive at the home page where they can paste a YouTube URL or upload an audio file.
Users select their preferred AI provider between Google Gemini and OpenAI.
The system processes the input audio, showing real-time status updates through a progress bar.
Upon completion, users can view the detailed transcription, concise summary, and key extracted topics on the dashboard.
Users can browse saved summaries from previous sessions for easy access.
Users access the settings page to securely update or add API keys for the AI providers.
validation_criteria: User authentication must restrict unauthorized access to protected routes.
The system correctly extracts audio from valid YouTube URLs and supports audio file uploads in supported formats.
Transcription and summarization use the selected AI provider accurately, producing relevant outputs.
Real-time progress updates are reliably streamed to the frontend without significant delay.
Transcriptions, summaries, and associated metadata are correctly saved and retrieved from the Supabase database.
Users can successfully save, update, and retrieve their API keys securely.
UI components render correctly on supported browsers and are responsive across devices.
Temporary uploaded audio files are deleted after processing to conserve storage.
Error handling gracefully informs users of invalid inputs or processing failures.
